note: Automation-first; assume manual steps fail unless evidence read-back verifies.
Chat not ledger; SideNotes are micro '#...' only; long notes become files w/ SHA.
IDs are stable identity; priority is separate; no renumbering.
CoPulse: one micro-question per wave; answer q1..q9 using compact icon anchors.
CoPulse-3: one micro-question per wave; reply !1=CoGo, !2=CoMeh, !3=CoNo.
NoPause default: keep executing until explicit stop token (CoStop/!3).
Ban <PLACEHOLDERS> in PS examples; use RUN_ID_HERE / {RUN_ID} / vars.
PreBakeNext: every response includes DONE + NEXT runnable queue to reduce CoPong wait.
Repair rule file; ban <...> placeholders + ban markdown fences in PS prompts; use RUN_ID_HERE/{RUN_ID}/vars.
Switch to PreBakeSandbox: each wave emits one DO block + writes NEXT wave script locally for immediate execution.
NoHereStringsInChatDO: prefer line arrays; if unavoidable use single-quoted + never nested; ban markdown fences in PS prompts.
CoGuardHeartbeat: emit GREEN/YELLOW/RED each wave based on determinism+CI.
AckInboundArtifacts: ACK any uploaded/mentioned artifact next wave with state+next action.
